body:
@gregglind @MattGrimes So opt-out studies, as they're currently implemented, no longer have a unique name that's generated by you (based on your feedback that coming up with unique slugs sucks). However, without a unique slug, what should we use to filter by study details?

Or, alternatively: We can filter by add-on ID. We can use that to filter out users already participating in a study if that study is using a study-specific add-on ID. Given that, maybe we don't even need this feature?
